title: Error in cfadDbze94 variable
description: An error in the cfadDbze94 variable (Table Emon and E3hrPt) was detected in CNRM-CM6-1/CNRM-ESM2-1 output (bug within the online coupling between the model and the COSP/CloudSat Radar simulator).  The erroneous output have been removed from the ESGF archive. The amip simulations, which have produced this diagnostic, will be rerun as soon as possible with a corrected diagnostic.
